attributes.name: luns
attributes.description: The luns associated with the current storageResource

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the storageResource instance.

attributes.name: health
attributes.description: Health information for the storage resource, as defined by the health resource type.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Unique name of the storage resource.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Storage resource description.

attributes.name: type
attributes.description: Storage resource type.

attributes.name: isReplicationDestination
attributes.description:
Indicates whether the storage resource is a replication destination. Valid values are:
  • true - Storage resource is a replication destination.
  • false - Storage resource is not a replication destination.

attributes.name: replicationType
attributes.description: Replication type.

attributes.name: sizeTotal
attributes.description: Storage resource size that the system presents to the host or end user.

attributes.name: sizeUsed
attributes.description: Quantity of pool space used by the storage resource. For a file system, this can be less than or equal to the value of the sizeAllocated attribute.

attributes.name: sizeAllocated
attributes.description:
Quantity of pool space reserved for the storage resource:
  • For all thin-provisioned resources, this can be less than the value of the sizeTotal attribute. For a thin-provisioned file system, this can be greater than or equal to the value of the sizeUsed attribute
  • For thick-provisioned resources,, this is equal to the value of the sizeUsed attribute.

attributes.name: thinStatus
attributes.description: Indicates whether the storage resource is thin-provisioned, thick-provisioned, or mixed.

attributes.name: dedupStatus
attributes.description: Deduplication status for the storage resource.

attributes.name: esxFilesystemMajorVersion
attributes.description: (Applies to VMware storage resources only.) VMFS major version.

attributes.name: esxFilesystemBlockSize
attributes.description: (Applies to VMware storage resources only.) VMFS block size.

attributes.name: snapSchedule
attributes.description: Snapshot schedule for the storage resource, as defined by the snapSchedule resource type. This value is blank if the storage resource is not associated with a snapshot schedule.

attributes.name: isSnapSchedulePaused
attributes.description:
(Applies if the storage resource has an associated snap schedule.) Indicates whether the snapshot schedule for the storage resource is paused. Valid values are:
  • true - Snapshot schedule for the storage resource is paused.
  • false - Snapshot schedule for the storage resource is active.

attributes.name: relocationPolicy
attributes.description: (Applies if FAST VP is supported on the system and the corresponding license is installed.) FAST VP tiering policy for the storage resource.

attributes.name: perTierSizeUsed
attributes.description: Tier sizes for the storage pool used by the storage resource.

attributes.name: blockHostAccess
attributes.description: Host access permissions for a block storage resource, as defined by the blockHostAccess resource type.

attributes.name: metadataSize
attributes.description: Quantity of pool space used by the storage resource metadata.

attributes.name: metadataSizeAllocated
attributes.description: Quantity of pool space reserved for the storage resource metadata.

attributes.name: snapsSizeTotal
attributes.description: Quantity of pool space used by storage resource snapshots.

attributes.name: snapsSizeAllocated
attributes.description: Quantity of pool space reserved for storage resource snapshots.

attributes.name: snapCount
attributes.description: Number of available storage resource snapshots.

attributes.name: vmwareUUID
attributes.description: VMware UUID of the VVol Datastore (Applies to VMware VVol Datastore resources only.).

attributes.name: pools
attributes.description: List of pools associated with this storage resource.

attributes.name: datastores
attributes.description: The datastores associated with the current storageResource

attributes.name: filesystem
attributes.description: The filesystem associated with the current storageResource

attributes.name: hostVVolDatastore
attributes.description: The hostVVolDatastores associated with the current storageResource

attributes.name: virtualVolumes
attributes.description: The virtualVolumes associated with the current storageResource
